column4: when I have xmms playing, espeak doesn't work. is there any tool I can pass the output to the mixer?
i've had problems with xmms and sound too, never used espeak though.  I'm trying to find another/better mp3 player.  maybe muine or something
if you right click on top window of xmms, go to options, then preferences, and you can change and configure the sound output.
